cast.overview: A fatalistic car crash in Mexico city sets off a chain of events in the lives of three people: a supermodel, a young man wanting to run off with his sister-in-law, and a homeless man. Their lives are catapulted into unforeseen situations instigated by the seemingly inconsequential destiny of a dog.
cast.title: Amores Perros

cast.overview: When a Spanish Jesuit goes into the South American wilderness to build a mission in the hope of converting the Indians of the region, a slave hunter is converted and joins his mission. When Spain sells the colony to Portugal, they are forced to defend all they have built against the Portuguese aggressors.
cast.title: The Mission

details.biography: Álvaro Guerrero (b. May 28, 1957 in Mexico City) is a Mexican film, theater, radio and television actor who has worked in various soap operas and Mexican films. He is the father of the actress and singer María José Guerrero.
details.name: Álvaro Guerrero
